talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of temporal energy that deals 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage, and reduces the targets three highest by 9, 12, 13, 15, 16 for 3 turns.

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Turn Back the Clock

talents.info_text: Reverts the minds of all creatures in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone to an infantile state, in effect confusing them (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% to act randomly) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Temporal Fugue Old

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 distortion of time, which deals 90, 122, 146, 167, 186 stacking temporal damage over 3 turns to all other creatures. The effect lasts 7, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns.

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ashes to Ashes
Body Reversion
talents.info_text:
You revert your body to a previous state, healing yourself for 307, 416, 500, 572, 635 life and removing 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 physical status effects (both good and bad).

The amount of life healed will scale with your Spellpower.

description: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.
name: Age Manipulation

talents.info_text: Teleports up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 up to ten tiles away.
talents.name: Anomaly Rearrange

talents.info_text: Teleports up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 up to 16, 21, 29, 35, 40 tiles away.
talents.name: Anomaly Teleport

talents.info_text: You swap locations with a random target.
talents.message: @Source@ swaps places with a nearby target.
talents.name: Anomaly Swap

talents.info_text:
50% chance that damage the caster takes will be warped to a set target.

Once the maximum damage (26, 83, 161, 230, 293) is absorbed, the time runs out, or the target dies, the shield will crumble.
talents.message: @Source@ transfers damage to a nearby target.
talents.name: Anomaly Displacement Shield

talents.info_text: Creates a wormhole nearby and a second wormhole up to ten tiles away.
talents.message: @Source@ folds the space between two points.
talents.name: Anomaly Wormhole

talents.info_text: Allows up to five targets in a radius of 6, 10, 14, 16, 18 to travel up to 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles through walls.
talents.message: @Source@ places several targets out of phase.
talents.name: Anomaly Probability Travel

talents.info_text: Up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 are teleporting 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles every turn.
talents.name: Anomaly Blink

talents.info_text: Pulls innocent people into the fight.
talents.message: Some innocent bystanders have been teleported into the fight.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Townsfolk

talents.info_text: Slows up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball by 7%, 12%, 18%, 23%, 27%.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of slow time.
talents.name: Anomaly Slow

talents.info_text: Increases global speed of up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball by 7%, 12%, 18%, 23%, 27%.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of fast time.
talents.name: Anomaly Haste

talents.info_text: Stuns up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of nul time.
talents.name: Anomaly Stop

talents.info_text: Time Prisons up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Bubble

talents.info_text: Time Shields up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a temporal shield around several targets.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Shield

talents.info_text: Invigorates up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Invigorate

talents.info_text: Clones a random creature within range.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Clone

talents.info_text: Creates a temporal storm for 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 to 2, 2, 4, 5, 6 turns that deals between 3.33, 6.18, 10, 14, 17 and 10, 19, 30, 41, 50 temporal damage each turn.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Storm

talents.info_text: Increases localized gravity, pulling in targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Gravity Pull

talents.info_text: Digs out all terrain in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.name: Anomaly Dig

talents.info_text: Entombs a single target in a wall of stone.
talents.name: Anomaly Entomb

talents.info_text: Places between three and six talents of up to 5 targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball on cooldown for up to 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Entropy

talents.info_text: Creates a gravity well in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball, pinning up to five targets.
talents.name: Anomaly Gravity Well

talents.info_text: Causes an earthquake in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Quake

talents.info_text: Reduces the resistances of up to five targets in a ball of radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 by 8%, 14%, 23%, 31%, 38%.
talents.message: @Source@ crumbles the resistances of several targets.
talents.name: Anomaly Flawed Design

talents.info_text: Summons three to six dust storms.
talents.name: Anomaly Dust Storm

talents.info_text: Summons three to six blazing fires.
talents.name: Anomaly Blazing Fire

talents.info_text: Turns up to 5 targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball to stone for 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Calcify

talents.info_text: Teleports between 3 and 6 targets to the caster.
talents.name: Anomaly Call

talents.info_text: Substantially toughens and hastes one target for 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Deus Ex

talents.info_text: Clones the caster.
talents.message: @Source@'s evil twin has come from another timeline.
talents.name: Anomaly Evil Twin

talents.info_text: Clones all creatures in a radius of 10.
talents.message: @Source@ has caused two threads to merge.
talents.name: Anomaly Intersecting Threads

talents.info_text: Digs out all terrain in between three and six radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 balls.
talents.name: Anomaly Mass Dig

talents.info_text: Summons a sphere of destruction.
talents.name: Anomaly Sphere of Destruction

talents.info_text: Summons three to six tornados.
talents.name: Anomaly Tornado

talents.info_text: Causes a meteor to fall from the sky.
talents.message: @Source@ causes a meteor to fall from the sky.
talents.name: Anomaly Meteor

talents.info_text: Tears a hole in the fabric of spacetime.
talents.message: @Source@ tears a hole in the fabric of spacetime.
talents.name: Anomaly Spacetime Tear

talents.info_text: Time elementals have been attracted to the timeline.
talents.message: Some Time Elementals have been attracted by @Source@'s meddling.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Time Elemental

description: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.
name: anomalies

description: A blend of chronomancy and dual-weapon combat.
name: Blade Threading

talents.info_text:
Attack with your melee weapons for 150%, 167%, 180%, 191%, 201% weapon damage as physical and temporal (warp) damage. If either attack hits you may stun, blind, pin, or confuse the target for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The bonus damage scales with your Spellpower.

Blade Threading talents will freely swap to your dual-weapons when activated if you have them in your secondary slots. Additionally you may use the Attack talent in a similar manner.
talents.name: Warp Blade

talents.info_text:
Attack all targets in a beam with your melee weapons for 105%, 116%, 124%, 130%, 137% temporal weapon damage.

If two or more targets are hit by the beam you'll braid their lifelines for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Braided targets take 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The damage transferred by the braid effect and beam damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Braided Blade

talents.info_text:
Attack with your melee weapons for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage and teleport next to up to two random enemies, attacking each for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage.

Blink Blade can hit the same target multiple times.
talents.name: Blink Blade

talents.info_text:
Attack up to three adjacent targets for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If any attack hits you'll create a temporal shear dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 temporal damage in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone.

Each target you hit with your weapons beyond the first increases the damage of the shear by 50%. Targets reduced below 20% of maximum life by the shear may be instantly slain.

The cone damage improves with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blade Shear

description: A blend of chronomancy and ranged combat.
name: Bow Threading

talents.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% temporal weapon damage. If the attack hits tune your Paradox up to 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 towards your baseline. This attack does not consume ammo.

Your arrows now also phase through friendly targets without causing them harm.

Bow Threading talents will freely swap to your bow when activated if you have one in your secondary slot. Additionally you may use the Shoot talent in a similar manner.
talents.name: Threaded Arrow

talents.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% weapon damage and call up to 2 wardens, depending on available space, that will each fire a single arrow before returning to their timelines.

The wardens are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% less damage but shoot through friendly targets.
talents.name: Arrow Stitching

talents.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. When the arrow reaches its destination or hits a target it will draw in all targets in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 and inflict 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first increases the damage 20, 26, 32, 36, 40 (up to 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Singularity Arrow

talents.info_text:
Fire an arrow for 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage at the target. Over the next 4 turns you'll fire up to 4 additional arrows at this target from your original location.

These echoed shots do not consume ammo.
talents.name: Arrow Echoes

description: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.
name: Chronomancy

talents.name: Precognition
talents.info_text:
You peer into the future, sensing creatures and traps in a radius of 13, 17, 21, 24, 27 for 2, 5, 8, 10, 12 turns.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight bonuses) while Precognition is active.

talents.name: Foresight
talents.info_text:
Gain 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 defense and 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% chance to shrug off critical hits.

If you have Precognition or See the Threads active these bonuses will be added to those effects, granting additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits.

These bonuses scale with your Magic stat.

Choose an activatable spell that affects only you and does not require a target. When you take damage that reduces your life below 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% the spell will automatically cast.

This spell will cast even if it is currently on cooldown, will not consume a turn or resources, and uses the talent level of Contingency or its own, whichever is lower.

This effect can only occur once every 50 turns and takes place after the damage is resolved.

Current Contingency Spell: None
talents.name: Contingency

talents.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 9, 13, 16, 19 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight values) while See the Threads is active.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

If you die in any thread you'll revert the timeline to the point when you first cast the spell and the effect will end.

This spell may only be used once per zone level.
talents.name: See the Threads

description: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.
name: energy

talents.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming damage, reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Energy Decomposition

talents.info_text:
You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.
talents.name: Energy Absorption

talents.info_text: For the next 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns chronomancy spells with a cooldown of 4, 6, 7, 9, 10 or less have a cooldown of one.
talents.name: Redux

talents.info_text: Each turn, for the next 1, 3, 5, 7, 8 turns, one of the target's sustained talents will be deactivated.
talents.name: Entropy

description: Weave the threads of fate.
name: Fate Weaving

talents.info_text:
Each time you would take damage from someone else you gain one Spin, increasing your defense and saves by 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 for three turns.

This effect may occur once per turn and stacks up to three Spin (for a maximum bonus of 9, 15, 21, 27, 30).
talents.name: Spin Fate

talents.info_text:
Activate to Seal Fate for 5 turns. When you damage a target while Seal Fate is active you gain Spin and have a 17%, 31%, 37%, 40%, 42% chance to increase the duration of one detrimental status effect on it by one turn.

If you have Spin Fate active the chance will be increased by 33% per Spin (for 34%, 63%, 74%, 80%, 84% at three Spin.)

The duration increase can occur up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 times per turn and the bonus Spin once per turn.
talents.name: Seal Fate
Fateweaver
talents.info_text: You now gain 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 combat accuracy, physical power, spellpower, and mindpower per Spin.

For the next 5 turns you displace 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy.

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional Spin per turn and your maximum Spin is doubled.
talents.name: Webs of Fate

description: Fluctuate spacetime.
name: flux

talents.info_text:
Create an anomaly, reducing your Paradox by 52, 70, 84, 97, 107. This spell will never produce a major anomaly.

Induced Anomalies may not be held by Twist Fate, nor do they cause held anomalies to trigger. However upon learning Twist Fate you may target Induced Anomalies.

The Paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Induce Anomaly

talents.info_text:
While active 30% of all damage you take is converted into 0.79, 0.55, 0.45, 0.39, 0.36 Paradox damage.

The Paradox damage is taken over three turns.
talents.name: Reality Smearing

talents.info_text:
Deals 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 temporal damage over 79, 107, 129, 148, 164 turns to all targets in a radius of 4. Targets with Reality Smearing active will instead recover 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 life per turn.

If a target is reduced below 20% life while Attenuate is active it may be instantly slain.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Attenuate

talents.info_text:
If Twist Fate is not on cooldown minor anomalies will be held for 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 turns, allowing your spell to cast as normal. While held you may cast Twist Fate in order to trigger the anomaly and may choose the target area.

If a second anomaly occurs while a prior one is held or the timed effect expires the first anomaly will trigger immediately, interrupting your current turn or action.

Paradox reductions from held anomalies occur when triggered.

Current Anomaly: None
talents.name: Twist Fate

description: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.
name: gravity

talents.info_text:
Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone, dealing 142, 193, 232, 265, 294 base physical (gravity) damage and knocking back targets caught in the area.

Targets knocked into walls or other targets take 25% additional damage and deal 25% damage to targets they're knocked into.

Closer targets will be knocked back further and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a gravity spike in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 that moves all targets towards the spell's center and inflicts 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical (gravity) damage.

Each target moved beyond the first increases the damage by 20, 26, 32, 36, 40 (up to a maximum of 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Spike

talents.info_text:
Create a gravity field around you that converts 13%, 26%, 34%, 40%, 45% all damage you deal into physical damage, slows incoming projectiles by 16%, 34%, 44%, 50%, 55%, and protects you from all gravity damage and effects.

Additionally, damage dealt by Repulsion Blast has a 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% chance to reduce the target's knockback resistance by half for two turns.
talents.name: Gravity Locus

talents.info_text:
Increases local gravity in a radius of 4 for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, dealing 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 physical (gravity) damage as well as decreasing the global speed of all affected targets by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

The damage done will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Well

description: Passive effects that Weapon Folding can trigger.
name: Manifold

talents.info_text:
When you hit with Weapon Folding you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance of dealing an additional 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to enemies in a radius of 1.

Affected targets may also have their physical and temporal resistance reduced by 30% for 2 turns.

This effect has a cooldown. If it triggers while on cooldown it will reduce the cooldown of Fold Gravity and Fold Warp by one turn.
talents.name: Fold Fate

talents.info_text:
When you hit with Weapon Folding you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance of dealing an additional 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 physical and 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 temporal (warp) damage to enemies in a radius of 1.

Each target hit may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 2 turns.

This effect has a cooldown. If it triggers while on cooldown it will reduce the cooldown of Fold Gravity and Fold Fate by one turn.
talents.name: Fold Warp

talents.info_text:
When you hit with Weapon Folding you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance of dealing an additional 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical (gravity) damage to enemies in a radius of 1.

Affected targets may also be slowed, decreasing their global speed speed by 30% for 2 turns

This effect has a cooldown. If it triggers while on cooldown it will reduce the cooldown of Fold Fate and Fold Warp by one turn.
talents.name: Fold Gravity

description: Change and shape matter itself.
name: matter

talents.info_text:
Fires a beam that turns matter into dust, inflicting 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical (warp) damage.

Alternatively you may target yourself, creating a field of radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 around you that will inflict the damage over three turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dust to Dust
Matter Weaving
talents.info_text:
Weave matter into your flesh, becoming incredibly resilient to damage. While active you gain 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 armour, 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% resistance to stunning, and 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% resistance to cuts.

The bonus to armour will scale with your Spellpower.

Create a tightly bound matter wall of up to a length of 3 that lasts 4 turns.

If any part of this wall is dug out it will explode, causing targets in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 to bleed for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage over six turns.
talents.name: Materialize Barrier

talents.info_text:
While active your physical and temporal damage has a 17%, 31%, 37%, 40%, 42% chance to remove one beneficial physical or magical temporary effect (respectively) from targets you hit.

Only one physical and one magical effect may be removed per turn from each target.

Additionally your Dust to Dust spell now digs up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 tiles into walls.
talents.name: Disintegration

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: other

talents.info_text: Saps away 30% of the targets speed and inflicts 149, 202, 243, 278, 308 temporal damage for three turns
talents.name: Speed Sap

talents.info_text:
Sends Dredges in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 into a frenzy for 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The frenzy will increase global speed by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, physical crit chance by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and prevent death until -32%, -39%, -43%, -47%, -49% life.
talents.name: Dredge Frenzy

talents.info_text: Start to sever the lifeline of the target. If after 4 turns the target is still in line of sight, it will die.
talents.name: Sever Lifeline

talents.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies to you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Warp Mine Toward

talents.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies away from you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Warp Mine Away
Spacetime Tuning
talents.info_text:
Use to set your preferred Paradox. While resting or waiting you'll adjust your Paradox towards this number over 20 turns.

Preferred Paradox : 0

Spellpower Modifier : 100%

Spellpower for Chronomancy : 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

Willpower Paradox Modifier : -20, -50, -100, -150, -200

Paradox Sustain Modifier : +0

Total Modifed Paradox : 280, 250, 200, 150, 100

Current Anomaly Chance : 0%

Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Slow
Spacetime Mastery
talents.info_text: Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 3, 6, 8, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.

talents.name: Quantum Feed
talents.info_text:
You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 16, 19, 23, 26.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.

You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Moment of Prescience
Gather the Threads
talents.info_text:
You begin to gather energy from other timelines. Your Spellpower will increase by 11, 21, 29, 37, 45 on the first turn and 1.83, 3.46, 4.88, 6.20, 7.43 more each additional turn.

The effect ends either when you cast a spell, or after five turns.

Eacn turn the effect is active, your Paradox will be reduced by 4, 8, 12, 15, 18.

This spell will not break Spacetime Tuning, nor will it be broken by activating Spacetime Tuning.

talents.name: Entropic Field
talents.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 41%, 53%, 62%, 69%, 76%, and increases your physical resistance by 20%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.

You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fade From Time
Paradox Clone
talents.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.
You bend space around you, displacing 6%, 10%, 13%, 15%, 16% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within range.
talents.name: Displace Damage

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 distortion of gravity, knocking back and dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage to all creatures inside it. The effect lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Field

talents.info_text:
Clones the target creature for up to 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns. The duration of the effect will be divided by half the target's rank, and the target will have have 52%, 56%, 60%, 62%, 65% of its normal life and deal 47%, 43%, 39%, 37%, 34% less damage.

If you clone a hostile creature the clone will target the creature it was cloned from.

The life and damage penalties will be lessened by your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Clone

talents.info_text:
You convert 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

This damage will bypass resistance and affinity.
talents.name: Damage Smearing
Phase Shift
talents.info_text: Phase shift yourself for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns; any damage greater than 10% of your maximum life will teleport you to an adjacent tile and be reduced by 50% (can only happen once per turn).

You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Swap

talents.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range.

You teleport to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and deals 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical warp damage to targets in the path.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Wake
Carbon Spikes
talents.info_text:
Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 32, 44, 53, 60, 67 and inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.

Destabilizes the target, inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage per turn for 10 turns. If the target dies while destabilized, it will explode, doing 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage in a radius of 4.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Destabilize

talents.info_text:
Attempts to pull the target apart at a molecular level, inflicting 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 temporal damage and 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 physical damage. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Quantum Spike deals 50% additional damage to targets affected by temporal destabilization and/or continuum destabilization.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Quantum Spike

description: Mastery of folding points in space.
name: Spacetime Folding

talents.name: Warp Mines
talents.info_text:
Learn to lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1. Warp Mines teleport targets that trigger them either toward you or away from you depending on the type of mine used and inflict 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic), last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, and each have a ten turn cooldown.

Investing in this talent improves the range of all Spacetime Folding talents and the damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.

Current Spacetime Folding Range: 5, 6, 8, 9, 10

Tether the target to the location for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Each turn the target has a 11%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21% chance per tile it's travelled away from the tether to be teleported back, inflicting 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 temporal (warp) damage to all enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 at both the entrance and exit locations.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Spatial Tether

talents.info_text:
Randomly teleports all enemies within a radius of three. Enemies will be teleported between 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 tiles from you and may be stunned, blinded, confused, or pinned for 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The chance of teleportion will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Banish

talents.info_text:
Create a radius three anti-teleport field for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns and daze all enemies in the area of effect for two turns.

Enemies attempting to teleport while anchored take 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal (warp) damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dimensional Anchor

description: Weave the threads of spacetime.
name: Spacetime Weaving

talents.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight.

At talent level 5 you may swap positions with a target creature.
talents.name: Dimensional Step
Dimensional Shift
talents.info_text: When you teleport you reduce the duration of up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 detrimental effects by 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 turns.

You fold the space between yourself and a second point within a range of 10, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported near the other (radius 4, 2, 2, 1, 1 accuracy).

The wormholes will last 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns and must be placed at least two tiles apart.

The chance of teleporting enemies will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Wormhole

talents.info_text:
When you teleport you fire a pulse that jolts enemies out of phase in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 around both the start and the destination point.

Each target has a 4%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 14% chance per tile you travelled to be stunned, blinded, confused, or pinned for 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.
talents.name: Phase Pulse

description: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.
name: Speed Control

talents.name: Celerity
talents.info_text: When you move you gain 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% movement speed for 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turns. This effect stacks up to three times but can only occur once per turn.

talents.name: Time Dilation
talents.info_text: When you use a non-instant chronomancy spell you gain 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% attack, spell, and mind speed for 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turns. This effect stacks up to three times but can only occur once per turn.
Increases your global speed by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% for 6 game turns.
talents.name: Haste
Time Stop
talents.info_text: Gain 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 turns. During this time your damage will be reduced by 100%.

description: Manipulate chronomantic spells.
name: Spellbinding

talents.name: Empower
talents.info_text:
Empowers the selected chronomancy spell, increasing spellpower when casting it by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Each spell can only be spellbound in one way at a time.

Current Empowered Spell: None

talents.name: Extension
talents.info_text:
Extends the duration of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Each spell can only be spellbound in one way at a time.

Current Extended Spell: None

talents.name: Matrix
talents.info_text:
Reduces the cooldown of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Each spell can only be spellbound in one way at a time.

Current Matrix Spell: None

talents.name: Quicken
talents.info_text:
Reduces the casting speed of the selected chronomancy spell by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Each spell can only be spellbound in one way at a time.

Current Quickened Spell: None

description: Stabilize spacetime.
name: stasis

talents.name: Spacetime Stability
talents.info_text:
When Spacetime Tuning is inactive you automatically adjust your Paradox 1.42, 2.71, 3.52, 4.07, 4.47 points towards your preferred Paradox each turn.

The time it takes you to adjust your Paradox with Spacetime Tuning is also reduced by 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 turns.

This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (363, 475, 561, 635, 700) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage.

While under the effect of Time Shield, all newly applied magical, physical and mental effects will have their durations reduced by 42%, 45%, 47%, 50%, 53%.

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Shield

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all targets in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stop

talents.info_text:
For the next 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 turns you may not create minor anomalies. You do not regain Paradox or lose the spell you're casting if a random anomaly would normally occur.

This spell has no effect on major anomalies.
talents.name: Static History

description: A blend of chronomancy and physical combat.
name: Temporal Combat

talents.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to your strikes.

Additionally you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance to gain 10% of a turn when your weapons hit.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon Folding

talents.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, you recover 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 life and talents without fixed cooldowns will have their cooldowns refresh twice as fast as usual.

The life regeneration will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invigorate

talents.info_text:
You now have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance to Fold Fate, Gravity, or Warp into your Weapon Folding damage.

Fold Fate: Deals 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets may lose 30% physical and temporal resistance for 2 turns.

Fold Warp: Deals 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 physical and 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 temporal damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, confused, or pinned for 2 turns.

Fold Gravity: Deals 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical damage to enemies in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. Affected targets will be slowed (30%) for 2 turns.

Each Fold has an eight turn cooldown. If an effect would be triggered while on cooldown it will reduce the cooldown of the other two Folds by one turn.
talents.name: Weapon Manifold

talents.info_text:
Attack the target with either your ranged or melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.

If the attack hits you'll breach the target's immunities, reducing armor hardiness, stun, pin, blindness, and confusion immunity by 50% for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Breach chance scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Breach

description: Warden combat training and techniques.
name: Temporal Guardian

talents.name: Strength of Purpose
talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using swords, axes, maces, knives, or bows.

You now also use your Magic in place of Strength when equipping weapons and ammo as well as when calculating weapon damage.

These bonuses override rather than stack with weapon mastery, knife mastery, and bow mastery.

talents.name: Guardian Unity
talents.info_text:
When a single hit deals more than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life another you appears and takes 24%, 37%, 45%, 50%, 54% of the damage as well as 24%, 37%, 45%, 50%, 54% of all damage you take for the next 2 turns.

The clone is out of phase with this reality and deals 50% less damage but its arrows will pass through friendly targets.

This talent has a cooldown.

talents.name: Vigilance
talents.info_text:
Improves your capacity to see invisible foes by +11, +14, +17, +19, +21 and to see through stealth by +11, +14, +17, +19, +21. Additionally you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance to recover from a single negative status effect each turn.

Sense abilities will scale with your Magic stat.

Attack the target with either your ranged or melee weapons for 120% weapon damage. For the next ten turns random targeting, such as from Blink Blade and Warden's Call, will focus on this target.

Additionally your bow attacks gain 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% critical chance and critical strike power against the target and you have a 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance to parry melee attacks from the target while you have your blades equipped.

While Warden's Focus is active you also take 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% less damage from vermin and normal rank enemies, if they're not also your focus target.
talents.name: Warden's Focus

description: Call temporal hounds to aid you in combat.
name: Temporal Hounds

talents.info_text:
Upon activation summon a Temporal Hound. Every 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns another hound will be summoned, up to a maximum of three hounds. If a hound dies you'll summon a new hound in 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns.

Your hounds inherit your increased damage percent, have 9%, 16%, 21%, 25%, 28% physical resistance and 38%, 67%, 87%, 100%, 100% temporal resistance, and are immune to hostile teleportation effects.

Hounds will get, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Strength, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Dexterity, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Constitution, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Magic, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Willpower, and 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Cunning, based on your Magic stat.
talents.name: Temporal Hounds

talents.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to teleport to the targeted location. If you target an enemy your hounds will set that enemy as their target.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 defense and 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% resist all after any teleport.

At talent level five, if you're not at your maximum number of hounds when you cast this spell a new one will be summoned.

The teleportation bonuses scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Command Hounds: Blink
Temporal Vigour
talents.info_text:
Your hounds can now survive for up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns after their hit points are reduced below 1. While in this state they deal 50% less damage but are immune to additional damage.

Command Blink will now regenerate your hounds for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life per turn and increase their global speed by 24%, 37%, 45%, 50%, 54% for five turns. Hounds below 1 life when this effect occurs will have the bonuses doubled.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% stun, blind, confusion, and pin resistance.

The regeneration scales with your Spellpower.

Command your Temporal Hounds to breathe time, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 temporal damage and reducing the three highest stats of all targets in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone.

Affected targets will have their stats reduced by 12, 15, 17, 19, 21 for 3 turns. You are immune to the breath of your own hounds and your hounds are immune to stat damage from other hounds.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% temporal damage affinity.
talents.name: Command Hounds: Breathe

description: A blend of ranged and dual-weapon combat.
name: Threaded Combat

talents.info_text:
Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If you shoot an arrow you'll teleport near the target location. If you use your dual-weapons you'll teleport up to ten tiles away from the target.

Additionally you now go Out of Phase for five turns after any teleport, gaining 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 defense, 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% resist all, and reducing the duration of new detrimental effects by 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21%.

The Out of Phase bonuses will scale with your Magic stat.
talents.name: Thread Walk
Blended Threads
talents.info_text:
When you hit with an arrow you reduce the damage you recieve from targets within two tiles of you by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

When you hit with your melee weapons you increase the damage you deal to targets more than two tiles away from you by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

Both of these effects may be active at once and last for four turns.

Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 155%, 170%, 181%, 191%, 199% damage.

If you use your bow you'll shoot a beam and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Blade Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

If you use your dual-weapons you'll attack all targets within a radius of one around you and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Bow Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

At talent level five cooldowns are reduced by two.
talents.name: Thread the Needle
Warden's Call
talents.info_text:
When you hit with a blade-threading or a bow-threading talent a warden may appear, depending on available space, from another timeline and shoot or attack a random enemy.

The wardens are out of phase with this reality and deal 78%, 55%, 44%, 39%, 35% less damage but the bow warden's arrows will pass through friendly targets.

This effect can only occur once per turn and the wardens return to their own timeline after attacking.

description: Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.
name: Timeline Threading

talents.info_text:
Rethread the timeline, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to the target before moving on to a second target.

Rethread can hit up to 3 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Rethread
Temporal Fugue
talents.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage received is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones.

Damage you deal to Fugue Clones or that they deal to you or each other is reduced to zero.

talents.name: Braid Lifelines
talents.info_text:
Your Rethread now braids the lifelines of all targets it hits for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. Braided targets take 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The amount of damage shared will scale with your Spellpower.

Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline, lowering its resistance to physical and temporal damage by 23%, 34%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

If you manage to kill the target while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The resistance penalty will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cease to Exist

description: Directly manipulate the flow of time
name: timetravel

talents.info_text:
Pull a bolt of temporal energy back through time. The bolt will home in on your location, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage to targets, and reducing the cooldown of one chronomancy talent on cooldown by one turn per enemy hit.

The bolt gains 5% damage each time it moves and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.

At talent level five cooldowns are reduced by two.
talents.name: Temporal Bolt

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 temporal damage. If your target survives, it may be removed from time for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Skip

talents.info_text: Transport yourself to a safe place for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Temporal Reprieve

talents.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Affected target take 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 temporal damage, as well as up to 22%, 31%, 36%, 40%, 43% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The additional damage will be divided by the target's rank and the damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Echoes From The Past
